summary: This is a neat sword (random choice) that does about 400+damage, restores 25health on hit and is quite OP, can one-hit giants dead
descriptionHtml:
I think I used an imperial sword or maybe a steel sword, can't remember.

It does more than 400Â  damage and I consider it a cheat item.
It also recharges player with 25 health each hit/s (successful hits obviously)

Once you have downloaded this with nmm, start your game, go to a forge.
Any normal forge, it uses a couple of iron ingots to make, the first upgrade
can be done for minimal resources too.

This is my first attempt at a mod, I am not going to update this.
I actually made it as an experiment to see if I like using creation kit.
I keep this weapon on me in game, but don't actully use it unless I feel its
the only way to progress. you can use it as much as you like tho.

You may not steal my work in anyway, You will be smited in one way or another.
If you wish to edit this mod, mention me in your credits, download and enjoy.
If this mod causes bugs, I don't need to know. My Skyrim is fully up to date and legit,
and it works fine there, so it should work fine anywhere (unless you're a pirate game player,
in that case just leave, don't touch my stuff).
author: RadHomez
